title: TSW New York Après Brunch
desc: Ladies and Gents,    In continuing the momentum of our apr?s work drinks at The Shakespeare last Thursday, we are looking to get our merry little band of NYC ski weekers together for a boozy brunch before we head into the official holiday (ski) season.     Looking to gather on Sunday the 22nd in recovery from your weekend festivities for some good food, great tunes and copious drinks. We will be headed to Miss Lily's 7A location where $40 per person gets you your food and unlimited brunch cocktails for 2 hours (you all know the deal). As always, friends welcome and speeches encouraged. Let us know ASAP if you're in for head count purposes.    Prost,    Red and Caroline
